snippet: Some in the West Wing privately wish Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. would step down, but resistance may stiffen for fear of emboldening opponents.
abstract: Furor over Justice Dept tactics in leak investigations has again engulfed Atty Gen Eric H Holder Jr in allegations, investigations and calls for his resignation; over course of four and a half years, no other member of Pres Obama's cabinet has been at the center of so many polarizing episodes or target of so much criticism.

byline.original: By PETER BAKER, CHARLIE SAVAGE and JONATHAN WEISMAN

lead_paragraph: Some in the West Wing privately wish Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. would step down, but resistance may stiffen for fear of emboldening opponents.

headline.seo: Goals to Fulfill and Foes to Foil Keep Holder Going
headline.main: Seeking a Fresh Start, Holder Finds a Fresh Set of Troubles
headline.print_headline: Seeking a Fresh Start, Holder Finds a Fresh Set of Troubles
